name: Bullet Sorrow VR
description: Bullet Sorrow VR is a Multi-player Online FPS game, also contains full story single stages to discover. Using progressive Bullet Time abilities and a bunker-cover system, evade attacks and move on! Available on Oculus Rift and HTC Vive.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 Processor: I5 4570 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce gtx970 DirectX: Version 11 Sound Card: 10.59
recommended_requirements: OS: WIN7 Processor: I7 4570 Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce gtx1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 920 MB available space Sound Card: 10.59
